==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Bahram:''' Selling things here is a pursuit of leisure.
:{{DIcon}} How's the business going?
::'''Bahram:''' It's enough to make the ends meet.
::'''Bahram:''' This is a key area on the river path to [[Sumeru]], so many caravans pass through all year round.
::'''Bahram:''' But you can travel along the river to [[Port Ormos]], so few merchants would stay here.
::'''Bahram:''' But it's also a good thing. Fewer merchants, less competition, you know.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Bahram:''' Take care.
{{Dialogue End}}
